designer: Thomas Phinney with Brandon Buerkle, Igor Freiberger & Vassil Kateliev.
description: Science Gothic is a variable font, commissioned by Google. Thomas Phinney was inspired by Morris Fuller Benton’s  Bank Gothic (1930–34), created for American Type Founders. Science Gothic builds on and extends Benton’s design by adding a lowercase, dramatic variation in weight and width, and a contrast (yopq) axis, somewhat reminiscent of Benton’s Broadway (1927) and other period designs such as R. Hunter Middleton’s Radiant (circa 1938–40) for Ludlow.
license: Licensed under Open Font License 1.1, with no reserved font name.
trademark: Science Gothic is a trademark of Font Detective LLC.
